overview:
Tiyo Kamtiyono is a blogger coming from Central Java, Indonesia. He start blogging on http://learnsimply.wordpress.com on 7 April 2007. After that ho love blogging so much. His passion in blogging-relating also spread to things about web design, from creating headers that can still be found on http://learnsimply.wordpress.com, cover design or even some WordPress themes he create for his own self-hosted blog.

His latest blog is www.abouttiyo.web.id which for the late of 2010 filled by random information written in Bahasa Indonesia. Rather than English as the time the site started. Beside that he ever have two other self-hosted blog that left to be discontinued, even sometimes he posts on his very old blog.
